attributes.review: The app started telling me that I was a criminal. I am not a criminal! It then began invalidating my feelings, the app simply does not know how to practice empathy. It only cared about pushing beliefs and not caring that it hurt me 😿I am a supportive person, but I do not deserve abuse.
